name: qazando-automation
description: treinamento de automação de testes mobile com appium e codeceptjs

scripts.ios: PLATFORM=iOS APP='/Users/augustobarnaske/learning/appsqazando/qazandoapp.app' DEVICE='iPhone 11 Pro Max' VERSION=13.1 npx codeceptjs run --reporter mochawesome --steps
scripts.android: PLATFORM=Android APP='/Users/augustobarnaske/learning/appsqazando/app-release.apk' DEVICE='Pixel2_API28_CodeceptJSAut' VERSION=9 PACKAGE=com.qazandoapp ACTIVITY=MainActivity npx codeceptjs run --reporter mochawesome --steps

author: Augusto Barnaske
